npn.name: NPN Transistor

model.name: Q2N2222
model.definition: .model Q2N2222 NPN(IS=1e-14 BF=200 VAF=100 IKF=0.3 ISE=1e-12 NE=1.5 BR=3 RC=1 CJC=8p CJE=25p TR=100n TF=400p)

pnp.name: PNP Transistor

model.name: Q2N2907
